content.question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Nigeria between 1990 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Nigeria. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the relationship between sources of authority and military spending in Nigeria. (c) Explain why military spending in Nigeria differs from military spending in Iran.

frqParts.text: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Nigeria between 1990 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Nigeria. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about the relationship between sources of authority and military spending in Nigeria. (c) Explain why military spending in Nigeria differs from military spending in Iran.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
